meanings.definition: A type of caterpillar that feeds on foliage.
meanings.sent1: The spanworms crawled slowly on the leaves.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are worried about the spanworms damaging their crops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous spanworms played tug-of-war with the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The spanworms seemed to dance on the branches, devouring everything in their path.
meanings.sent5: The garden was overrun by a colorful army of spanworms.

meanings.definition: The larvae of certain moths that damage crops.
meanings.sent1: After hatching, the spanworms quickly started munching on the plants.
meanings.sent2: The farmers had to take action to control the spanworm infestation.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous spanworms formed a conga line on the cornstalks.
meanings.sent4: The spanworms were like tiny wrecking balls, leaving a trail of destruction behind them.
meanings.sent5: The fields were under siege by an army of hungry spanworms.

meanings.definition: Small, slender worms that resemble measuring tapes.
meanings.sent1: The kids were fascinated by the spanworms wriggling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the behavior of spanworms in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The playful spanworms twisted and turned like tiny acrobats.
meanings.sent4: The spanworms inched along the tree trunk, measuring the distance carefully.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the movement of colorful spanworms.
